00021 class CInspectionTaskComp:
00022                      public ibase::CLoggerComponentBase,
00023                      virtual public IInspectionTask,
00024                      protected imod::CMultiModelBridgeBase
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00028 
00029        enum MessageId
00030        {
00031               MI_BAD_PARAMS_COUNT = 0x5af30,
00032               MI_NO_SUBTASK
00033        };
00034 
00035        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(CInspectionTaskComp);
00036               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IInspectionTask);
00037               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iproc::ISupplier);
00038               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT(Parameters);
00039               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(Parameters, iprm::IParamsSet, ExtractParameters);
00040               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(Parameters, iser::ISerializable, ExtractParameters);
00041               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(Parameters, istd::IChangeable, ExtractParameters);
00042               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(Parameters, imod::IModel, ExtractParameters);
00043               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_subtasksCompPtr, "Subtasks", "List of subtasks (suppliers)", true);
00044               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_subtaskModelsCompPtr, m_subtasksCompPtr, true);
00045               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_subtaskInspectionCompPtr, m_subtasksCompPtr, false);
00046               I_ASSIGN(m_serializeSuppliersAttrPtr, "SerializeSuppliers", "If it is true, parameters of suppliers will be serialized", true, true);
00047               I_ASSIGN(m_reduceHierarchyAttrPtr, "ReduceHierarchy", "If it is true, sub inspection tasks will rolled out", true, false);
00048               I_ASSIGN(m_generalParamsCompPtr, "GeneralParams", "Optional general parameter set, it will be always serialized", false, "GeneralParams");
00049               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_generalParamsModelCompPtr, m_generalParamsCompPtr, true);
00050        I_END_COMPONENT;
00051 
00052        // reimplemented (iinsp::IInspectionTask)
00053        virtual int GetSubtasksCount() const;
00054        virtual iproc::ISupplier* GetSubtask(int subtaskIndex) const;
00055 
00056        // reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00057        virtual void InvalidateSupplier();
00058        virtual void EnsureWorkFinished();
00059        virtual void ClearWorkResults();
00060        virtual int GetWorkStatus() const;
00061        virtual iprm::IParamsSet* GetModelParametersSet() const;
00062

00065        virtual void OnComponentCreated();

00076

00103        template <class InterfaceType>
